Row.Text: The [B]Goryeo [/B] is from the same continent as [B]Silla [/b].
[B]{LOC_LEADER_HIMIKO_ALT_NAME}[/B] was from the same region as the [B]Goryeo[/B].
[B]Trung Trac[/B] was from the same region as the [B]Goryeo[/B].
The [B]Goryeo [/B] is from the same region as [B]Khmer [/b].
The [B]Goryeo [/B] is from the same region as [B]Han [/b].

InsertOrIgnore.Text: [B]Fish Resouces[/B] were an important commodity to the [B]Goryeo[/B].
The farmers and fishers of the Sea begin work at dawn. Later the markets are fill with the Fish Resouces have become vital to the {1_Civilization_Adj} economy... as have their procurers.
You have unlocked Geryeo by improving 3 Fish Resources.
